title: Lesson 3: The single signal
desc:
Great!

It seems like you've got a good grasp on the game's mechanics! Let's talk about terminology. Haptapp is an unary communication method, meaning that it is a language with only one letter/signal. And because there is only one kind of signal, its name doesn't really matter. Let's call it "1" for now. We will also refer to each signal as "tap".
